ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I believe this must have changed this patch.  It was giving messages as of the previous patch, but I only saw them twice when I didn t re-Chain the
ygData.messageBody:
Actually I believe this must have changed this patch. It was giving
messages as of the previous patch, but I only saw them twice when I didn't
re-Chain the mob. It was always lasting for the full duration basically and
that was on blue to yellow cons. I was using it yesterday on green cons and
it was wearing off early fairly often.

A week ago I could keep high blue gargoyles continuously chained with a 3
song weave, yesterday I couldn't always keep mobs 10 levels below me
continuously chained.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 18, 2000 11:46 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Selo's Consonant Chain


Hey,

Now that we are getting messages when our song effects wear off, I've
noticed that our snare song amost never lasts the full duration. Many times
it wears off as soon as I finish singing it.

I was wondering if any of you were having the same problem and whether or
not this is by design or a bug that we should bring to the attention of the
powers that be.

Draelon
